item.description:
Paula J coordinating. She has us penciled in with this company on the 16th and they know we could be a big group. Will need a head count. They can handle people who are heavy but want to know before hand if people weigh 250 or more so they will have the proper horses available.
Here is the web site. http://www.crowleysho... Looks like a nice place. Check it out.

TWeather looks like it will cooperate. I propose we meet at the Wrentham outlets at 8:30, leave by 9 - it's a good 2 1/2 hour ride via the Mass Pike; bring your transponder if you have one. The ride back will take about 3 1/2 hours as it's all back roads.
item.name: Horseback Riding
